articles.title: Oops! Harry Potter reunion show uses photo of Emma Roberts instead of Emma Watson - CNA
articles.description: The HBO special's small hiccup featured a childhood photo of the American Horror Story actress instead of Hermione Granger herself.
articles.content: Mistaken identity aside, the HBO Max special offered a few revelations regarding the 31-year-old Watson, including how she almost quit her role and having a huge crush on co-star Tom Felton, who play… [+448 chars]

articles.title: China and Russia Military Cooperation Raises Prospect of New Challenge to American Power - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Joint military exercises and technology sharing are seen as tools in to limit U.S. might abroad

articles.title: Donie O'Sullivan helps Irish couple get engaged on New Year's Eve live on TV in New York - Independent.ie
articles.description: A young Tyrone couple got engaged live on American TV on New Year’s Eve with the help of a well-known Irish journalist.
articles.content:
A young Tyrone couple got engaged live on American TV on New Years Eve with the help of a well-known Irish journalist.
